Legends

There are a few Cultures in Serberistan. These range from the Sansuvut Nomads, to the Cliff Dwelling Dragnar, to the bustling cities of the Derina Valley. Each culture has its own set of stories and legends to explain the world and the history of their people

Sansuvut Nomads

The Lament of Leluka

The Song of Goras

Song of Saint Germaine

Song of Saint Celestine
